title: How to Defeat Sniper Wolf in Metal Gear Solid

steps.headline: Right after Meryl is shot, do not go into the open.
steps.description: She will just shoot you without hesitation.

steps.headline: Go back all the way to the Basement Floor 2 of the hanger to get a PSG1
Go back to where Meryl was (she is now gone) and get in the corner
Just peek out a little bit and shoot.
For part 2 fighting in a blizzard, she will hide the trees.
steps.description: Shoot her once you get the chance by staying in the corner. Never leaving yourself in the middle.

text: Right after Meryl is shot, do not go into the open. She will just shoot you without hesitation. Go back all the way to the Basement Floor 2 of the hanger to get a PSG1  Go back to where Meryl was (she is now gone) and get in the corner  Just peek out a little bit and shoot.  For part 2 fighting in a blizzard, she will hide the trees. Shoot her once you get the chance by staying in the corner. Never leaving yourself in the middle.
